name: Music_2161.wav
keywords: ['autotuned male vocal', 'arabic dance pop', 'heavy autotune', 'rapid bright synth melody', 'four on the floor', 'dance', 'hi-hats', 'sixteenth notes']
caption: This is an upbeat Arabic dance pop song. There's an energetic male singer with a heavily autotuned voice who sings to the beat. The beat features a four on the floor kick drum pattern and hi-hats being played in a pattern of 16th notes. There's a rapid repeated synth melody riff. The song would be heard at a dance club.
